doc:
Lori March https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lori_March 0 Lori March (March 6, 1923 – March 19, 2013) was an American television actress. She was best known for her roles on daytime soap operas. Her obituary on the Television Academy's web site noted that she "was dubbed 'First Lady of Daytime Television.'" Lori_March ( March_6_,_1923 – March_19_,_2013 ) was an_American_television_actress . She was_best_known for her_roles on daytime_soap_operas . Her_obituary on the_Television_Academy 's_web_site noted that she " was_dubbed '_First_Lady of Daytime_Television .
